content:
ApplicationIntent Enum

Definition

Specifies a value for stem.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnectionStringBuilder.ApplicationIntent*. Possible values are ReadWrite and ReadOnly.

In this Article

public enum ApplicationIntent
Inheritance
Object
ValueType
Enum
ApplicationIntent

Fields

ReadOnly

The application workload type when connecting to a server is read only.
ReadWrite

The application workload type when connecting to a server is read write.
